title: SQL Injection: app.py:42
description: User input from 'username' parameter is directly concatenated into SQL query without sanitization
recommendation: Use parameterized queries with sqlalchemy's text() function or ORM query methods
exploit_scenario: Attacker can craft input like `admin' OR '1'='1` to bypass authentication

title: XSS: templates/user_profile.html:15
description: User-provided bio text is rendered without escaping
recommendation: Use Flask's escape() function or enable auto-escaping in Jinja2
exploit_scenario: Attacker can inject <script>alert(document.cookie)</script> to steal session tokens

title: Hardcoded Secret: config.py:8
description: API key is hardcoded in source code
recommendation: Move secrets to environment variables or AWS Secrets Manager
